name: Legend of Azzenburg
description:
*this is a playable demo of the game*

Legend of Azzenburg is a Top-Down, 2D, Dungeon Crawler game where you pick a difficulty and try to beat it as fast as you can.

Lore:

You are an apprentice mage at the magic school, Azzenburg. And you are a very curious one at that. You always experiment with new and exciting magic but one day you took it a little too far. You've opened a portal to another realm. In this realm there are dragons, demons and all sorts of monsters. They have leaked out of the portal and have now taken over the magic school. To fix your own mistake you must now strike back the monsters and defeat their leader to close the portal and win the game.
